name: Writing Services
description:
I am available for freelance assignments, consulting and special projects: I cover general topics with a specialization in business, fashion, beauty and lifestyle. I work in the San Diego area, but I’m available for long-distance projects, working via email, skype, phone or US Mail. Email me today at hello@rosemreyes.com to discuss your project or to obtain a quote.

Services:
 Website Content
 Emails, autoresponders, and e-newsletters
 Articles (trade, newspaper, magazine, and online)
 Product descriptions
 Online advertising
 Brochures
 Landing pages
 Direct mail campaigns
 Ghostwriting services
 Developing your business name and tagline

Price: $100 per hour

Email me today at hello@rosemreyes.com to discuss your project or to obtain a quote.

name: Social Media Basic Package
description:
I’ll perform regular maintenance on your network of social media accounts, including;

 Social media marketing strategy
 Facebook – setup, enhance & promotion
 Twitter - setup, enhance & promotion
 Flickr - setup, enhance & promotion
 Tumblr - setup, enhance & promotion
 YouTube - setup, enhance & promotion

A la Carte - Price: $50 per hour – 4 updates on a daily or weekly basis. You decide!

Email me today at hello@rosemreyes.com to discuss your project or to obtain a quote.
